name: Bacon Borlotti and Sage Sauce
recipeIngredient: 75 g smoked bacon (rinds removed and diced),
250 g  can borlotti beans (rinsed and drained),
recipeInstructions: 1. Heat the oil in a large saucepan, add the bacon, onion, and sage leaves, and cook over a medium heat until golden. Add the borlotti beans.

2. Heat the stock, Mix the flour and the tomato puree in a small bowl, then stir in the hot stock and the wine. Pour into the bean mixture, stirring with a wooden spoon, then cook over low heat until the sauce thickens.
3. Remove the sage leaves and and salt and pepper to taste. Garnish with a few fresh sage leaves and the grated cheese.
